archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.3e: e) evaluate the level of each risk to the target environment through the use of standardised risk equations (e.g. based on impact and likelihood ratings or frequency of threat events and financial loss)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
